players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so the mafia is among us. Charlie, why did you remain silent? Diana, any thoughts?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. My investigation is clear. Bob, we must vote together to win."
You: "I vote for Charlie. Diana's investigation is clear."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
